tools.name: tool_calendar_day
tools.description: When the tool_calendar needs to be invoked: 1. If the user provides a specific date, use that date as the target date; 2. If the user refers to today or yesterday and so on, first obtain the actual current date; 3. Finally convert the date to YYYY-MM-DD format and if the month or day has a leading zero, keep only one digit, not '0M' or '0D' like that before calling tool_calendar.
